mapper.select: SELECT h.id , img_src, h.title, house_type, orientation, sum_price, unit_price, community, hl.title AS label_title FROM ( SELECT * FROM biz_house WHERE del_flag = 0 LIMIT #{start} , #{limit} ) h LEFT JOIN biz_house_label hl ON hl.house_id = h.id ORDER BY h.create_date DESC

SELECT h.id, h.img_src AS imgSrc, title, house_type AS houseType, orientation, sum_price AS sumPrice, unit_price AS unitPrice, community, house_area AS houseArea, floor, fitment, heating, house_year AS houseYear, floor_type AS floorType, `comment`, u.user_name AS `createUser.username`, u.img_src AS `createUser.imgSrc`, u.phone AS `createUser.phone` FROM biz_house h LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON u.id = h.create_by WHERE h.id = #{id} LIMIT 1
